Un français parmis vous ? 😄

Specialised task entrusted to theses experienced artisans. . . Puts lump of paste into mechanical press.. puts mould underneath. . puts thin sheet of bread on top.. Skims off excess paste.. skims layer of icing. . pushes button to release Calissons .. slides piece of metal underneath to pick them up.
Yes, I can see how 15 mins of training here could be considered for a title of a highly skilled artisan.

For all you people complaining about people not wearing gloves.....I have almost 3 decades in the food industry. Washed bare hands are absolutely as sanitary as wearing gloves, and much safer for workers using equipment.
